video.title: 2008: An Egg Odyssey (Trailer)
video.description:
2008: An Egg Odyssey is D. R. Hirschberg’s dazzling, Easter egg hunt achievement, a compelling drama of man vs. egg. A stunning meld of music and motion. Hirschberg (who borrowed the theme from Stanley Kubrick’s 2001: A Space Odyssey) first visits an uninspired Grandmother (Marilyn Mildred) on Easter morning, then leaps hours into a slow motion egg hunting frenzy with two children (Nolan Riley & Julia Ryan) as they search the uncharted realms of Grandma’s backyard. Let an awesome egg hunt unlike any other begin.

Official Web Site: EggOdyssey.runadun.com

RFP PRESENTS D. R. HIRSCHBERG’S “2008: AN EGG ODYSSEY” STARRING MARILYN MILDRED NOLAN RILEY JULIA RYAN SCREENPLAY BY D. R. HIRSCHBERG BASED ON THE FILM 2001: A SPACE ODYSSEY PRODUCED AND DIRECTED BY D. R. HIRSCHBERG.

This movie is for promotional viewing only. Not for sale.
